titles: A worthy panegyrick upon monarchy; written anno MDCLVIII. / By a learned and truly loyal gentleman, for information of the miserably mis-led Commonwealths-Men (falsely so called) of that deluded age; and now revived by one that honours the author, and the established government of these nations.
author: A learned and truly loyal gentleman.
notes: Verse: "If wanting wings one may ascend the skies ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
